4 Numerical Analysis

4.1 Overview

The analysis package is the parent package for algorithms dealing with real-valued functions of one real variable. It contains dedicated sub-packages providing numerical root-finding, ....

Functions interfaces are intended to be implemented by user code to represent their domain problems. ....

4.2 Error handling

For user-defined functions, when the method encounters an error during evaluation, users must use their own unchecked exceptions. The following example shows ....

As shown in this example the exception is really something local to user code and there is a guarantee Apache Commons Math will not mess with it. The user is safe.
